name: CUBE (itch) (patric_fryer1, IisTom)
description:
Created and submitted for the Game Makers Toolkit 2020 Game Jam

Description:

A challenging platformer set in a familiar location from the golden ages. If you know, you know.

Controls (Keyboard / Gamepad):

Space or Action Button: Jump  /  Select

Esc or Start: Close Game
